title: Macrovenus and Pan-Yakibito
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Take-out, Bakery
description: Macrobiotic bakery and café. Located a 10-minute walk from Umegaoka station on the Odakyu Line, walking distance from Shimo-kitazawa. All bread is made using natural yeast and without cane sugar. Address 東京都世田谷区代田1-35-13. May 2016 reported no longer offering lunch or dinner. May 2016 reported using eggs and dairy.
